verbs.description: [ARG0: Members of Democratic leadership] [V: tore] into [ARG1: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARGM-CAU: for reversing his endorsement of the Group of Seven ( G-7 ) joint communique and threatening to impose tariffs on Canada] .
